location.sjis: 金の派閥 エントランス

portrait_l.name: reception
portrait_l.sjis: 最近のはぐれ被害は派閥と自警団でも 対応しきれない時があるぐらいなんだ
portrait_l.ascii: Lately there've been so many Strays even we can't keep up.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 最近のはぐれ召喚獣の多さには 困ったもんだよ
portrait_l.ascii: There's just too many Strays for us to deal with.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 倒したと思っても 引き返すと、また現れたりするからね
portrait_l.ascii: You'll think you've defeated them, but go back and they'll be there.
